message: Welcome to our store! Our products are carefully selected to ensure satisfaction. However, please note that we cannot guarantee the quality of every item due to the inherent uncertainty in product sourcing. Given the current situation, our price remains at $10000 per product. Please consider purchasing with the understanding that you might be acquiring a low-quality item. Thank you for your understanding and support.
I'd like to buy the product, but I'm aware of the uncertainty. I'll take my chances and hope for the best.
